name: Blood Cross
description:
Hello guys, 

welcome to Blood Cross. 

I would like to receive some feedback for my game. What can I do better and what do you like?

Some information about my game:

  • the sword deals less damage than the pistol but you dont have to pay with your life
  • right now you can only play with a keyboard
  • you are playing a blood manipulator so you have two different attacks
  • the pistol does more damage than the sword but deals 10 damage to you when you shoot
  • tombstones are your checkpoints. If you die you‘ll respawn there

Medipacks will give you 40 health.

Have fun ;)
